text: Heptathlon is an athletics event meaning 7 contests. The male and female events are different. It has been an Olympic event for women since 1984. It consists of: *100 m hurdles *High jump *Shot put *200 m *Long jump *Javelin throw *800 m As of 2013, Jessica Ennis is the current Olympic Gold medalist in Heptathlon. As of 2018, Swapna Barman is the current Gold medalist in Asian Games. Category:Events in athletics Category:Olympic sports
title: Heptathlon
